MBC Action Broadcast Package

Motion Graphics

MBC Action is a TV channel that focuses on broadcasting only action films. I took on the challenge of creating a broadcast package for this channel knowing that it required a style I rarely get to work with. Above is a demo of the opening title, transition, and lower thirds graphics.
